state of the art performance.from sentence: We show that CNN+MCFA achieves state of the art performance on three of the four data sets and performs competitively on one data set.

performs competitively.from sentence: We show that CNN+MCFA achieves state of the art performance on three of the four data sets and performs competitively on one data set.

MR data set.from sentence: Finally, our ensemble classifier additionally outperforms all competing models on the MR data set.

N = 1.from sentence: When N = 1, MCFA increases the performance of a normal CNN from 85.0 to 87.6, beating the current state of the art on the CR data set.

N = 10.from sentence: When N = 10, MCFA additionally beats the state of the art on the TREC data set.
